title: My Sunshine
description: Chloe quickly percieved a lie in John Bernett'sway of life. Instintively knowing that John would never be his dream man. After all who will stay with a 'schizo'.John who is a member of a popular rock band having beautiful women at his disposal battleswith his mind, telling himself ''i know i'm dreaming , and i'll wake soon.'' As he journeys into this adventure, he can't but only wonder. what's wrong with him.The compelling characters, sexual tension suspense, action, passion and intrigue combine to create a rousing, edge-of-your- seat romantic novel with plot twist that will keep readers mesmerized until the very last page.
author: Emmanuel Enyeribe
